name: Run Away (itch) (Brondold)
description:
Run Away is a FPS game where you just need to survive in an environnement filled with zombies.

To survive, you will have a lot of possibilities like shooting bullets, plasma ball or throwing grenade !

Good luck to survive in this apocaliptical city... Just run away and survive !

How to play ?

-Left Clic Mouse : Shoot

-Right Clic Mouse : Zoom

-E : Throw Grenade

-Shift : Sprint

-Ctrl : Crouch
